description:
Get to the end and find the treasure! Most testers NEVER EVEN GOT CLOSE. First person to send me a legit screenshot of the giant duck AND the treasure chest in THE SAME IMAGE will forever have their username inscribed in the waterfall cave. (leave a comment on here first and I'll add you on steam)

It's a whole new game, good luck :)

Works in multiplayer as well, put bugs on the github.

[MODDERS] If you fork the mod, change the mod id. And add something cool don't just re-upload it. https://github.com/Woukie/Scrapfarer

Russian translation: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-2LaVuvCj-I

This is my last mod.
name: Scrapfarer
